system.description: 1 or 5 points, +0, Mentem: This power allows angels to appear in the dreams of a target, or even while awake, and impart a Divine message. This is different to a miraculous vision, which occurs through direct Divine agency. An Envisioning that takes place while the target is awake costs five points and may seem like a daydream, or a vivid or frightening vision, depending on what message the angel intends. Anyone may be the target of Envisioning, pious and impious, pagan and infernalist. Envisioning may occur over any distance.
